TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: Serializes and deserializes objects into and from XML documents.

span.span: Serializes and deserializes objects into and from XML documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 序列化 (Serialization) 是將物件公用屬性和欄位轉換為儲存或傳輸所用的序列格式 (此處即為 XML) 的程。XML serialization is the process of converting an object's public properties and fields to a serial format (in this case, XML) for storage or transport. 還原序列化 (Deserialization) 是從 XML 將物件重新建立成它的原始狀態。Deserialization re-creates the object in its original state from the XML. 類別會序列化以及還原序列化具有可擴充格式的 SAML 安全性權杖。The class serializes and deserializes SAML security tokens, which have an extensible format. 不同於多數的其他安全性權杖， 安全性權杖會包含能夠針對應用程式需求加以自訂的 XML 項目和屬性。Unlike many other security tokens, security tokens include XML elements and attributes that can be customized for an application's needs. 某些 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 擴充點會包含 ``、`` 以及 `` 項目。Some of the extensibility points for a SAML assertion include the ``, ``, and `` elements. 如需覆寫這些項目之個別讀取方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 、 和 方法。For more details about overriding how each of these elements are read, see the , , and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SAML 判斷提示中的 `` 項目是 SAML 權杖的擴充點。The `` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens. 為了建立可以讀取自訂屬性的序列化程式，此時會從 衍生類別，並覆寫 方法。To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from and override the method.

span.span: An to read the attributes.

summary.span: Reads an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token using the specified XML reader.

span.span: Reads an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token using the specified XML reader.

returns.span: A that represents a claim that is an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token.

span.span: A that represents a claim that is an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式定義本身的屬性集合時 (因為 SAML 屬性是個擴充點，所以可以這樣處理)，就需要使用瞭解如何讀取這些屬性的序列化程式。When an application defines its own set of attributes, which is possible because SAML attributes is an extensibility point, a serializer that understands how to read those attributes is needed. SAML 屬性與 XML 屬性不同。A SAML attribute is different than an XML attribute. SAML 屬性包含在 `` 項目中，並且能夠包含語式正確 (Well-Formed) 的任何 XML，而不是只包含屬性。A SAML attribute is contained within a `` element and can contain any well-formed XML, not just an attribute. 為了建立可以讀取自訂屬性的序列化程式，此時會從 衍生類別，並覆寫 方法。To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from and override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示來指定其宣告；在 SAML 判斷提示中，宣告的詳細資訊會指定於 SAML 陳述式中。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions where the details of the claims are specified in SAML statements. SAML 規格會定義下列陳述式型別：The SAML specification defines the following statement types: - - - - 方法會讀取之前列出的 SAML 陳述式。The method reads the SAML statements listed previously. 當自訂陳述式已定義並且由應用程式所使用時，便會建立負責讀取陳述式內容的序列化程式。When custom statements are defined and used by an application, create a serializer to read the contents of them. 為了建立自訂序列化程式，此時會從 衍生類別，並覆寫 方法。To create the custom serializer, derive a class from and override the method. 自訂的 SAML 陳述式會包含在 `` 項目中。Custom SAML statements are contained within a `` element. ## Examples

span.span: is .

SAML 判斷提示的擴充點包含 ``、`` 以及 `` 項目。Extensibility points for a SAML assertion include the ``, ``, and `` elements. 如需覆寫這些項目之個別讀取方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 、 和 方法。For more details about overriding how each of these elements are read, see the , , and methods.
